text: The Ghana national badminton team represents Ghana in international badminton team competitions.https://bwf.tournamentsoftware.com/sport/tournament.aspx?id=0211D10E-ED56-46FB-8053-9461630C3CF8 ==Participation in African Badminton Championships== Men's team {| class="wikitable" |- !
